body:
With the "Interactive Map - Places" component is easy to add an interactive map to your AdaptLearning course.

You can have:

  1. multiple maps on the same page
  2. each map can have marker icons to identify places on the map
  3. marker places are clickable and can display additional information to the student (text, image, link to resource)
  4. each map can also display a title and a description text
  5. component completion can depend on visualization of all places 

Add a new place to the map is pretty easy, all you need to know is the address (or "famous name") of the place you want to display.

Note: to work with Google Maps you must request a free key for your website/course to this address: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key . Please also check Google Maps Terms of Service.
displayTitle: Example of usage of the map with clickable marker places
title: Example of usage of the map with clickable marker places
